AppPush.Title: [EN] Bitbucket CDN Deprecation Notice
AppPush.Message:
Hi Collapse users!
Bitbucket CDN is getting deprecated and will soon be fully removed from Collapse. This is due to the maintenance and downtime that were caused when the CDN was nearing its capacity, and, as such, would cause users to not get the latest data.
All users using this CDN are advised to change to another one as soon as possible. For Mainland China users, please try using Coding or Cloudflare.

AppPush.Title: [EN] HoYoPlay API Migration Notice
AppPush.Message:
Heyya Collapse users!
We have updated some game APIs to the new HoYoPlay API. The API update is currently applied for Genshin Impact (Glb/CN) and Honkai Impact 3rd (CN), for new game installations only. Please make sure you're on latest Collapse version (1.80.5+) to prevent any issues. Should you encounter any, please inform us via Discord or in the GitHub discussion thread below.

RegionPush.Title: [EN] Game Update is Expected
RegionPush.Message:
Hi Travelers!
Upon updating to the new API, it is expected to have an 'Update Game' notice in Collapse. You can press the button. Collapse *will not* re-download the entire game package, rather, only some files will updated. This is normal.
